content.question: Hotspur represents an example of

choices.label: “the same sordid figure in the pages of history”
“the being whose tepid soul knows nothing of great and generous emotion”
“the men who quell the storm and ride the thunder”

content.answer: “the men who quell the storm and ride the thunder”

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
